cRefPattern.p: This pattern references a specific line.
This pattern references an inscribed surface.
This pattern references a specific artefact, usually a tablet.

div.l: [... PA a lu2] izi ra-ra ama-ni x ⸢HUB2⸣-ba ba-[...]
[... ⸢{d}]ama⸣-ušumgal-an-na PA a lu2 izi ra-ra ama-⸢ni⸣ [...]
[...]-⸢e⸣ er2-ra ša3 sag3-ga-ni er2 nu-uš-gul-e sig7#?-[sig7 ...]
[... {d}]dumu-zi er2-ra ša3 sag3-ga-ni er2 nu-uš-gul-e sig7#?-[sig7 ...]
[...] x a-nir-ra še? ša4? u4 mi-ni-[...]
..., ..., the one that sets on fire/is set on fire(?), his mother ...
Amaušumgalana, ..., the one that sets on fire/is set on fire(?) his mother ...
... alas, the youth, the youthfulness of the youth(?) ...
... alas, the shepherd Dumuzi, the youthfulness of the youth(?) ...
If only ... could stop her lamentation and distress, ... sobbing
If only ... could stop her lamentation and distress (for) Dumuzi(?), ... sobbing
... spends the day(?) in lament and wailing(?)
... spends the day(?) with darkened ..., a ... heart, ...
